question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Moist Alpine scrub?
1) Found all along the Himalayas and on the higher hills near the Myanmar border.
2) It has a low scrub and dense evergreen forest.
3) Mosses and ferns cover the ground in patches.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Moist Alpine scrub are found all along the Himalayas and on the higher hills near the Myanmar border. They have a low scrub and dense evergreen forest. Mosses and ferns also covers the ground in patches.
